dublin_core.dcvalue: Suneeta Krishnan, Senior Epidemiologist, RTI International, Email: skrishnana@rti.org | Sharmila Neogi, Maternal Health Specialist, USAID, Email: sneogi@usaid.gov

Mobilise is a mobile technology that provides supportive services for domestic violence (DV) prevention. The system has 4 mHealth tools: mTrainer to build primary health care providers' knowledge & skills to address DV; mSoukhya to support HCW's with identification of and response to women experiencing violence; mShakti to raise community awareness of DV among CHW's; and mSupervise to engage supervision of HCW's and the health system response to DV
